name: RetrieveErrorGroupingRules
description:
Retrieve error tracking grouping rules for an environment.

This tool retrieves error tracking grouping rules for a specified environment and project. It should be called when you need detailed information about the grouping rules applied to error tracking in a particular environment.

parameters.name: grouping_rule_id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this specific error tracking grouping rule for retrieval.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this error tracking grouping rule.

parameters.name: project_id_for_access
parameters.description: The ID of the project you are trying to access for retrieving error tracking grouping rules. Obtain using the /api/projects/ endpoint.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this error tracking grouping rule.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this error tracking grouping rule.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
